item.title: GAMETHING, Season 4: Horror
item.description: HOW ARE YOU EVEN SEEING THIS? GAMETHING, Season 4: Horror Season 4 of GAMETHING, my podcast with David Wolinsky, is about horror games! We’re exchanging answering machine messages about games like Alone in the Dark, Anatomy, and Who’s Lila?! The episodes are short. You might as well listen to one. Season 1 (2018) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 1 Season 2 (2019) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 2 Links GAMETHING on SoundCloud

item.title: GAMETHING, Season 3: Simulators
item.description: HOW ARE YOU EVEN SEEING THIS? GAMETHING, Season 3: Simulators Season 3 of GAMETHING, my podcast with David Wolinsky, is about simulator games! We exchanged answering machine messages about games like Alter Ego, BeamNG.drive, and WolfQuest! The episodes are short. You might as well listen to one. Season 1 (2018) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 1 Season 2 (2019) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 2 Links GAMETHING on SoundCloud GAMETHING on Apple Podcast

item.title: GAMETHING
item.description: HOW ARE YOU EVEN SEEING THIS? GAMETHING GAMETHING is an audio book club about videogames. Experimental game designer Pippin Barr and writer-interviewer David Wolinsky exchange answerphone messages about anything and everything (mostly everything) they find interesting about videogames. (Subscribe to our newsletter to hear when new seasons are ready.) The episodes are short. You might as well listen to one. Season 1 (2018) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 1 Season 2 (2019) GAMETHING · GAMETHING, season 2 Links GAMETHING on SoundCloud
